data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 2
data.actual_result: You can't use landscape mode for the in-app browser.
data.expected_result: The whole in-app browser should support landscape mode or only for images and videos (like in the Discord app itself).
data.short_description: [iPhone, iPod only] In-App browser doesn't support landscape mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your Discord user settings - Change your web browser to the in-app browser - Find any video, image link - Click on it to open it in the in-app browser - Try to rotate your device to the landscape mode
